banner.guestTitle: Unlock extra features with an account
banner.guestDescription: You can use all tools without an account. Sign in to enable cloud-synced sets, cross-set insights, and integrations with your SFDataHub profile.
banner.accountComingSoon: These features are in development and will roll out gradually.
banner.featureSetComparison: Compare your sets to find the best setups.
banner.featureIntegration: Link your sets with player profiles, guilds, and other modules.
banner.featureCloudSync: Sync your sets across devices with your SFDataHub account.

hero.heading: Welcome to SFDataHub
hero.lead: Learn what you can do, how data freshness works, and where to find settings or legal info.
hero.freshnessBody: Data is refreshed regularly. You will see the exact scan time directly inside top lists and profiles.

intro.title: What is SFDataHub?
intro.body1: SFDataHub is a community project around Shakes & Fidget.
intro.body2: You can analyse scan data, browse top lists, and open detailed player and guild profiles. The goal: a quick overview of progress, rankings, and development – without any official connection to Playa Games.

actions.title: What can I do on SFDataHub?

items.toplists: Browse top lists: compare players and guilds by level or other metrics.
items.profiles: Open profiles: view detailed player and guild profiles with extra information.
items.guides: Read guides: use guides and tips to plan your progress.
items.tools: Use tools & calculators: run interactive tools such as a dungeon XP calculator.

freshness.title: How up to date is the data?
freshness.body1: SFDataHub is based on scans uploaded or linked by the community.
freshness.body2: Next to many values you’ll find the time of the last scan (for example “Last scan: 2025-12-01”).
freshness.body3: Top lists and profiles are updated regularly. If an entry hasn’t been scanned for a while, the displayed values might differ from the current state in the game.

login.title: Login & Settings
login.body1: You can log in with your Discord account to unlock additional features.
login.body2: After logging in you’ll see your profile menu with avatar and name in the header.
login.body3: In the settings you can adjust basic options for your SFDataHub account.
login.body4: Settings are only relevant for logged-in users – without an account there’s nothing to configure.

legal.title: Help, feedback & legal information
legal.body1: If you notice bugs, strange data, or have ideas for new features, we’re happy to hear from you.
legal.body2: You can find contact options and more information on the contact or imprint page.
legal.body3: For legal details please use the linked pages:
